title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Men in Black
description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

title: Good Will Hunting
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: L.A. Confidential
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: The Fifth Element
description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

title: As Good as It Gets
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: Boogie Nights
description: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

title: Air Force One
description: Communist Radicals hijack Air Force One with The U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

title: Face/Off
description: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity of a criminal mastermind, who murdered his only son.

title: Liar Liar
description: A fast-talking lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints him for the last time.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
description: A 1960s hipster secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

title: Starship Troopers
description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

title: Jackie Brown
description: A middle-aged flight attendant smuggles money for a gun runner to ensure her retirement, but she gets caught by the ATF and must cooperate to bring him down.

title: Contact
description: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

title: The Devil's Advocate
description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

title: Gattaca
description: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

title: The Full Monty
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Musical or Comedy Score
description: Six unemployed steel workers, inspired by a touring group of male strippers, decide to make some quick cash by forming their own act with a slightly different gimmick.

title: Donnie Brasco
description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
description: James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul from inducing war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

title: Batman & Robin
description: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

title: George of the Jungle
description: George, who was raised by apes, falls in love with a wealthy heiress and experiences the big city for the first time.

title: Scream 2
description: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
description: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

title: Flubber
description: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

title: Conspiracy Theory
description: A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true.

title: Hercules
description: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero to reclaim it.

title: Anastasia
description: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Dante's Peak
description: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town named Dante's Peak after a long dormant volcano, which has recently been named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that Dante's Peak may wake up at any moment.

title: Volcano
description: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles, threatening to destroy the city.

title: The Game
description: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

title: Wag the Dog
description: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

title: In & Out
description: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

title: The Rainmaker
description: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

title: Cop Land
description: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

title: Grosse Pointe Blank
description: Martin Blank is a professional hitman. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion is taking place there at the same time.

title: Chasing Amy
description: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but there's a heavy load of baggage: she's a lesbian.

title: The Ice Storm
description: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives out of control.

title: The Sweet Hereafter
description: A visiting big-city lawyer rallies the community to file a class-action lawsuit against the people they feel are responsible for a tragic school bus accident.

title: The Apostle
description: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts a new church.

title: Ulee's Gold
description: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight through a dangerous situation first.

title: Deconstructing Harry
description: Suffering from writer's block and waiting for his book to be published, Harry Block's life is laid bare when he drives to his old university to receive an honorary degree.

title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
description: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local eccentric millionaire.

title: Event Horizon
description: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

title: Cube
description: Six complete strangers with widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

title: Life Is Beautiful
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony.

title: Happy Together
description: A couple takes a trip to Argentina but breaks up along the way; later, they meet again and try to reconcile their volatile relationship.

title: Funny Games
description: Two psychotic young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

title: Taste of Cherry
description: A middle-aged man drives his truck in search of someone who will bury him under a cherry tree after he commits suicide.

title: Alien: Resurrection
description: Two hundred years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

title: The Jackal
description: An imprisoned IRA fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly faceless assassin from completing his next job.

title: Kiss the Girls
description: Police forensic psychologist Alex Cross tracks a serial killer who kidnaps strong-willed women, with the help of one of the killer's escaped victims.

title: The Peacemaker
description: A US Army colonel and a civilian nuclear expert must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

title: Amistad
description: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

title: Seven Years in Tibet
description: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

title: Kundun
description: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.
